name: Xtaloid
description:
This is the very, VERY early version of a game in progress.

You're the blue block at the center. Use the arrows to move, use WASD to shoot.

Score points by picking up green things. Avoid other colors (you'll lose points).

However, if you touch something green that's adjacent to other colors, you'll pick up those other colors and get bonus points.

Shooting does very little so far; it just clears out existing red blocks. (Green cannot be shot.)

This will eventually turn into a full game, but the direction is still TBD.
